item.title: iD8: Arcade Arena
item.dc:creator: user
item.description:
iD8 Labs presents, Arcade Arena! The gaming tournament organized by the iD8 Student Club, be prepared to win glory, fame and riches as you compete with other fellow students to determine who will be the best of the best! We will be testing the skills of the participants in 3 Read more…

The post iD8: Arcade Arena first appeared on iD8.
item.content:encoded:
iD8 Labs presents, Arcade Arena! The gaming tournament organized by the iD8 Student Club, be prepared to win glory, fame and riches as you compete with other fellow students to determine who will be the best of the best!

We will be testing the skills of the participants in 3 different games which you can choose whichever one you wish to compete in! The 3 games are FIFA 23, Mario Kart 8, and Mobile Legends!

Below are further explanations regarding the proceedings for each games:

FIFA 23

The FIFA 23 tournament will be held in the style of Round of 16, participants will be assigned their own brackets and will then have to compete and play against one another to see who can win the tournament!

The FIFA 23 tournament will be held from 3 PM to 9 PM. Below is the itinerary for the tournament.

  • 3 PM – 4 PM (Event Open Registration Time)
  • 4 PM – 6 PM (Round of 16 Style Battle)
  • 6 PM – 8 PM (Semi Finals and Finals)
  • 8 PM – 9 PM (Prize Ceremony)

Mario Kart 8

The Mario Kart tournament will be held in the style of qualifiers, semi-finals, and finals! Compete to see who is the best driver amongst all the participants!

The Mario Kart 8 tournament will be held from 3 PM to 9 PM. Below is the itinerary for the tournament.

  • 3 PM – 4 PM (Event Open Registration Time)
  • 4 PM – 6 PM (Qualifiers)
  • 6 PM – 8 PM (Semi Finals and Finals)

Mobile Legends

The Mobile Legends tournament will test your personal skills and your skills in working with your teammates as the tournament will be participated by teams of 5!

The Mobile Legends tournament will be held from 6.30 PM – 10 PM. Below is the itinerary for the tournament.

  • 6.30 PM – 7.30 PM (Team A vs Team B ( Bracket 1 ) and Team C vs Team D ( Bracket 2 ))
  • 7.30 PM – 8.30 PM (Team E vs Team F ( Bracket 3) and Winner of Bracket 1 vs Bracket 2)
  • 8.30 PM – 10 PM (Finals and the Prize Ceremony)

This tournament will be held on the 11th of December.

Before the tournaments begins, from 12 PM – 3PM there will be a free play session at C3-04 where students can freely relax and play either Mario Kart 8 or FIFA 23 with other fellow students.

The prize pool for each tournament will be started at 15 SGD for the Mario Kart 8 and FIFA 23 tournaments whilst the Mobile Legends tournament will have an initial prize pool of 30 SGD. 100% of the registration fee which has been paid will be contributing towards the prize pool of whichever game that person registers for.

The FIFA 23 and Mario Kart 8 tournaments will be a winner takes all type of competition! The first place winner will win 100% of the prize pool, so sharpen your skills and prepare yourself even more!

The Mobile Legends tournament will be a tournament where the first place takes 70% of the prize pool while the second place takes 30% of the prize pool!

Players for the FIFA 23 and Mario Kart 8 tournament are allowed to bring their own controllers, however if they do not have one, iD8 got you covered as we can provide you with one!

So don’t hesitate and register with us now to prove that you truly are the best!

Register Form: https://forms.gle/NawStzbrHr9aTgyu6

The post iD8: Arcade Arena first appeared on iD8.

item.title: iD8: Career Talk with CYS, KPMG and MicroSec
item.dc:creator: user
item.description:
The Double Edged Sword of AI in the Workplace: Balancing Efficiency and Ethics Join for a career talk with a panel filled with industry professionals who will share their views and discuss about the topic of AI in the workplace, join the discussion with how AI can be valuable to Read more…

The post iD8: Career Talk with CYS, KPMG and MicroSec first appeared on iD8.
item.content:encoded:
The Double Edged Sword of AI in the Workplace: Balancing Efficiency and Ethics

Join for a career talk with a panel filled with industry professionals who will share their views and discuss about the topic of AI in the workplace, join the discussion with how AI can be valuable to the workplace, and what ethical considerations there are associated with it’s usage.

Build connections with them and network with industry guests and industry partners who will also be attending this event!

We have invited industry professionals from KPMG, Cyber Youth Singapore, MicroSec, and a lecturer from the Brisbane Campus of James Cook University. The panel talk will also be moderated by Dr. Steve Kerrison

Furthermore, enjoy dinner provided entirely by us, whereby as you enjoy dinner you will also be able to create connections with invited industry professionals, industry partners, and industry guests.

The event will occur on the 5th of December from 6.30 PM to 8.30 PM.

Register for this event now through the link below and expand your knowledge and connections with us!

Registration Link: Form

The post iD8: Career Talk with CYS, KPMG and MicroSec first appeared on iD8.

item.content:encoded:

Gather your friends, polish your skills, and embark on a journey to become the ultimate Mario Smash Bros champion.

For further information, contact : +65 87252015, +65 88340967

item.title: iD8: Welcome Party!
item.dc:creator: user
item.description:
This is the first event which iD8 will be hosting and is what will set the tone for the rest of the trimester! Join us in our welcome party by registering your details in the form provided below! The Welcome Party will be held on the 23rd of November, from Read more…

The post iD8: Welcome Party! first appeared on iD8.
item.content:encoded:
This is the first event which iD8 will be hosting and is what will set the tone for the rest of the trimester!

Join us in our welcome party by registering your details in the form provided below!

The Welcome Party will be held on the 23rd of November, from 6 PM to 9 PM at C2-13. There will be a variety of fun activities to do which you can take part in by coming over for the part.

The list of activities includes:

  • Introductions to iD8
  • Jackbox Game Session
  • Networking Session

The introductions will be where the executives introduce themselves as well as explaining what iD8 is and what the club is aiming to do as well as the possible future events which iD8 wishes to host.

The Jackbox Game session will be the icebreaker for the party where people will play fun games from Jackbox and get to know each other better through playing those games.

The networking session is where people will talk and mingle all the while enjoying the food which will be provided by the club. You will be able to further introduce yourself and talk with people who possess similar interests to you.

We will be providing free pizza, snacks, and free refreshments!

All are welcome to join this event where you can talk, mingle and have fun.

Registration Form: Welcome Party RSVP

The post iD8: Welcome Party! first appeared on iD8.

item.title: Career Craft: CV Excellence and Insightful IT Career Guidance
item.dc:creator: user
item.description:
Join us for an event made in collaboration with the Careers Department of James Cook University Singapore! Our Career Craft event provides any student who had participated in the Success Workshops an opportunity to further their insights into how to successfully start your career in the IT industry with the Read more…

The post Career Craft: CV Excellence and Insightful IT Career Guidance first appeared on iD8.
item.content:encoded:
Join us for an event made in collaboration with the Careers Department of James Cook University Singapore!

Our Career Craft event provides any student who had participated in the Success Workshops an opportunity to further their insights into how to successfully start your career in the IT industry with the help of an accomplished Lead Game Designer of Paradox Studios which we have invited to give criticism and feedback for your CVs.

Pre-requisites*:

Before the event you are required to create your own CV and transform it yourself according to your own design or using a template that we will provide.

(We recommend participating in the Success Workshop hosted by the James Cook University Careers Department. During which you will be given a basic tutorial on how to create a traditional CV by experts who specialize in helping people get started with their career, after the workshop we will give you a brief crash course on what will happen for the Career Craft event and what to do before the day of the event as well!)

We will be giving interested students the template which they will use to transform the traditional CVs they have created during the Success Workshops into web CV designs that can be typically seen used by industry professionals to showcase their skills. The transformed CV can be based on the template design which we will provide or students can create their own design based on an outline which we will also provide. The transformed CV can be designed through a design software such as Figma or Canva.

Students who wish to participate in the event will have to submit their web CV design on the 27th November or the 28th November.

The event itself will be held on the 30th of November from 2 PM to 3.30 PM, with the schedule being as follows:

  • Introductions of the Guest Speaker
  • Feedback and Critique of the submitted CVs
  • Panel Talk segment where the speaker will share his experience with matters regarding CVs
  • Q&A Session
  • Networking Session with refreshments and drinks

In the time from between the Success Workshop and the Career Craft event, the students interested in participating in the event can ask questions to any of the iD8 executive committee, where we will help you or refer you to an alumni with rich experience or an industry expert we believe have the answers to your question. We will help you as best as we can in your journey of creating your web CV design!

Students who have designed the best web CV design as judged by our invited speaker will have their CVs published unto the iD8 website here where anyone can view their design!

Join us now by registering through the link provided below and get a head start in developing your career now!

Registration Form: Here

The post Career Craft: CV Excellence and Insightful IT Career Guidance first appeared on iD8.

item.title: iD8: Christmas Party
item.dc:creator: user
item.description:
Merry Christmas to all students! We at iD8 wish you all the best and as our way of celebrating and commemorating Christmas, we have decided to host a Christmas party where all are free to attend! Come join us in our fun and festivities as we do a number of Read more…

The post iD8: Christmas Party first appeared on iD8.
item.content:encoded:
Merry Christmas to all students! We at iD8 wish you all the best and as our way of celebrating and commemorating Christmas, we have decided to host a Christmas party where all are free to attend!

Come join us in our fun and festivities as we do a number of fun activities including:

  • Movie Watch Together
  • Christmas Dinner

Watch a movie along with us all during the Movie Watch Together as we enjoy the finest of Christmas movies all the while enjoying tasty snacks.

Share in the joy of eating while enjoying the company of those you consider friends and acquaintances in our Christmas Dinner event with the spirit of Christmas and the free delicious food strengthening relationships and bonds alike.

The event will be held on the 21st of December from 6 PM to 9 PM.

Don’t miss out on the fun and come join us!

Registration Form: Sign up here !!

The post iD8: Christmas Party first appeared on iD8.
